#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType GolfCourse.

== Name ==

GolfCourse (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfCourse (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Description of a course: Mmedia (photographs, videos, sketches...), notes, holes and tee-set.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (name, architect?, (media | note)`*` , holes?, tee-set+, version`*`  )</...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || architect ||  					Architect(s) of the golf course.				 ||
|| [CHoles.html golfml:Holes] || [CHoles.html holes] ||  					Description of the individual holes.				 ||
|| [CMedia.html golfml:Media] || [CMedia.html media] ||  						Medias associated with the golf course.					 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  Name of a tee set. ||
|| [CNote.html golfml:Note] || [CNote.html note] ||  						Notes and comments associated with the golf course.					 ||
|| [CTees.html golfml:Tees] || [CTees.html tee-set] ||  					Description of a tee set for the golf course.				 ||
|| [CVersion.html golfml:Version] || [CVersion.html version] ||  					Records history of the golf course.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CCountryClub.html CountryClub]
